channel.title: Lunch with the Devs on OSCAL
channel.description: Recent content in Lunch with the Devs on OSCAL

item.title: April 4th, 2020
item.description: Reviewed current status, discussed renaming the system-security-plan and plan-of-action-and-milestones top-level elements in the respective OSCAL models, and held open discussion.

item.title: April 4th, 2020
item.description: Reviewed current status, discussed new assessment-related models, and held open discussion.

item.title: Thursday, March 26th, 2020
item.description: Reviewed current status and held open discussion on increasing community participation.
